channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft to Cut 9,000 Jobs in Second Wave of Layoffs
Microsoft announces another mass layoff, thousands of workers affected
Nvidia Stock Is Rising. Why Wall Street’s Banking on a Fresh Rally.
Scientists stunned after finding remote island blanketed in dangerous material: 'Our findings are deeply concerning'
Trump's Tax Bill Plans To Decimate Medicaid. For One Group, The Cuts Will Be Unspeakably Cruel.
A Tohono O'odham family integrates Catholic and Native beliefs in the Arizona desert
item.description: The history of encounters between Catholicism and Native spirituality has often been marred by violence and oppression

item.title: Daughter of slain civil rights leader sees echoes of US political violence

item.title: Thousands of Philadelphia city workers on strike but judge orders some back to work
item.description: A strike being staged by nearly 10,000 city workers in Philadelphia has entered its second day

item.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court’s liberal majority strikes down 176-year-old abortion ban
item.description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court has struck down the state’s 176-year-old abortion ban

item.title: Explosion at a California fireworks warehouse sets off fires and forces evacuations
